name: Frozen Atmosphere
description:
Frozen Atmosphere is a puzzle platforming first person adventure game set on a abandoned space station floating in space. Your job is to find power cells from the space station to recharge your spacecraft to get out. Your spacesuit is equipped with a small quantum state drive that allows you to slow time briefly, gravity defying boots for double jumping, power enhancing exoskeleton so you can lift things that make some bodybuilders slightly jealous.

Made by Team Rocket Chicken

https://teamrocketchicken.wixsite.com/home
